articles.content: CES 2021 officially kicks off next week but a lot of companies are already previewing what’s to come. Sony, LG, Hisense and Samsung all have new TVs to show off next week and you can keep up with all… [+3130 chars]

articles.title: Harman unveils fresh home speakers under JBL and Harman / Kardon brands - Phone Mantra
articles.description: Harman today hosted a massive online event showcasing products that will represent the company in the market this year. Besides professional audio equipment, headphones, and wireless speakers, home multimedia acoustics were also shown.
articles.content:
Harman
Among the novelties, it is worth noting the wireless speaker for home use Harman / Kardon Onyx Studio 7. The device favourably stands out with rich surround stereo sound and an exquisite body… [+803 chars]
